name: Total population by broad age group, both sexes, 1950-2100 - UN Population Division (2015)
title: Total population by broad age group, both sexes, 1950-2100 - UN Population Division (2015)
description: The data file used is called “Annual Population by Age Groups - Both Sexes” on the website given. This original data file divides the population into 5-year age groups. These columns were added together to create the broad age groups in this file.

sources.name: UN Population Division (2015)
sources.additionalInfo: The data file used is called “Annual Population by Age Groups - Both Sexes” on the website given. This original data file divides the population into 5-year age groups. These columns were added together to create the broad age groups in this file.
